mapper.select: SELECT CATE_CONTENT, NUM, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT_DATE, VIEWNUM, LIKENUM FROM BOARDVIEW
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARDVIEW
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDVIEW(NUM, WRITER, HEAD_CODE, TITLE, CONTENT, PHOTO, VIEWNUM, LIKENUM, CONTENT_DATE, CATE_CONTENT) VALUES(MAX(#{num}) + 1, '#{writer}', '#{head_code}', '#{title}' , '#{content}', '#{photo}', '#{viewNum}', '#{likeNum}' , SYSDATE, '#{cate_content}')
